absorb.name: absorb
absorb.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

acid.name: acid
acid.description: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

acidspray.name: acidspray
acidspray.description: The user attacks by spitting fluid that works to melt the target. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

aeroblast.name: aeroblast
aeroblast.description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

aircutter.name: aircutter
aircutter.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

airslash.name: airslash
airslash.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

ancientpower.name: ancientpower

appleacid.name: appleacid

armorcannon.name: armorcannon

astralbarrage.name: astralbarrage

aurasphere.name: aurasphere

aurorabeam.name: aurorabeam

bittermalice.name: bittermalice

blastburn.name: blastburn

blizzard.name: blizzard

blueflare.name: blueflare

boomburst.name: boomburst

brine.name: brine
brine.description: This move's power is doubled if the target's HP is at half or less.

bubblebeam.name: bubblebeam

bugbuzz.name: bugbuzz

burnup.name: burnup

burningjealousy.name: burningjealousy

chargebeam.name: chargebeam

chatter.name: chatter

confusion.name: confusion

darkpulse.name: darkpulse

dazzlinggleam.name: dazzlinggleam

dragonbreath.name: dragonbreath

dragonenergy.name: dragonenergy

dragonpulse.name: dragonpulse

dreameater.name: dreameater

dynamaxcannon.name: dynamaxcannon

extrasensory.name: extrasensory

firespin.name: firespin

flamethrower.name: flamethrower

fleurcannon.name: fleurcannon

focusblast.name: focusblast

frostbreath.name: frostbreath

fusionflare.name: fusionflare

futuresight.name: futuresight

gigadrain.name: gigadrain

glaciate.name: glaciate

gust.name: gust

heatwave.name: heatwave

hurricane.name: hurricane

hydrocannon.name: hydrocannon

luminacrash.name: luminacrash

magmastorm.name: magmastorm

makeitrain.name: makeitrain

megadrain.name: megadrain

meteorbeam.name: meteorbeam

mistball.name: mistball

moonblast.name: moonblast

mudshot.name: mudshot

mud-slap.name: mud-slap

muddywater.name: muddywater

mysticalfire.name: mysticalfire

mysticalpower.name: mysticalpower

nightdaze.name: nightdaze

overheat.name: overheat

paraboliccharge.name: paraboliccharge

photongeyser.name: photongeyser

prismaticlaser.name: prismaticlaser

psybeam.name: psybeam

psystrike.name: psystrike

round.name: round

ruination.name: ruination

seedflare.name: seedflare

shockwave.name: shockwave

sludge.name: sludge

terablast.name: terablast

watershuriken.description: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

waterspout.name: waterspout
waterspout.description: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

weatherball.name: weatherball
weatherball.description: This move's type and power change depending on the weather at the time the move is used.

whirlpool.name: whirlpool
whirlpool.description: The user traps the target inside a violent, swirling whirlpool that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

wildboltstorm.name: wildboltstorm
wildboltstorm.description: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

zapcannon.name: zapcannon
zapcannon.description: The user attacks by firing an electric blast like a cannon. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

acidarmor.name: acidarmor
acidarmor.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

acupressure.name: acupressure
acupressure.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.

afteryou.name: afteryou
afteryou.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

agility.name: agility
agility.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply boosts its Speed stat.

allyswitch.name: allyswitch
allyswitch.description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

amnesia.name: amnesia
amnesia.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

aquaring.name: aquaring
aquaring.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

aromaticmist.name: aromaticmist
aromaticmist.description: The user boosts the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

attract.name: attract
attract.description: If the target is of the opposite gender to the user, it becomes infatuated with the user and will sometimes be unable to use its moves.

auroraveil.name: auroraveil
auroraveil.description: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only when it is snowing.

baby-dolleyes.name: baby-dolleyes
baby-dolleyes.description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.

banefulbunker.name: banefulbunker
banefulbunker.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

batonpass.name: batonpass
batonpass.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

bellydrum.name: bellydrum
bellydrum.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat but loses HP equal to half its max HP.

block.name: block
block.description: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent the target from fleeing.

bulkup.name: bulkup
bulkup.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting its Attack and Defense stats.

calmmind.name: calmmind
calmmind.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to boost its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

celebrate.name: celebrate
celebrate.description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

charge.name: charge
charge.description: The user becomes charged, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move it uses. This also boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

charm.name: charm
charm.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.

chillyreception.name: chillyreception
chillyreception.description: The user tells a chillingly bad joke before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting. This summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

clangoroussoul.name: clangoroussoul
clangoroussoul.description: The user boosts all its stats by using some of its own HP.

coaching.name: coaching
coaching.description: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

coil.name: coil
coil.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This boosts its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

confide.name: confide
confide.description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

confuseray.name: confuseray
confuseray.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes confusion.

conversion.name: conversion
conversion.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

conversion2.name: conversion2
conversion2.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the move the target used last.

copycat.name: copycat
copycat.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. This move fails if no other move has been used yet.

corrosivegas.name: corrosivegas
corrosivegas.description: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items held by other Pokémon.

cosmicpower.name: cosmicpower
cosmicpower.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to boost its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

cottonguard.name: cottonguard
cottonguard.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically boosting its Defense stat.

cottonspore.name: cottonspore
cottonspore.description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon. This harshly lowers their Speed stats.

courtchange.name: courtchange
courtchange.description: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

curse.name: curse
curse.description: A move that has different effects depending on whether the user is a Ghost type or not.

darkvoid.name: darkvoid
darkvoid.description: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that puts them to sleep.

decorate.name: decorate
decorate.description: The user sharply boosts the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

defendorder.name: defendorder
defendorder.description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, boosting its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

defensecurl.name: defensecurl
defensecurl.description: The user curls up and boosts its Defense stat.

defog.name: defog
defog.description: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

destinybond.name: destinybond
destinybond.description: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the Pokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

detect.name: detect
detect.description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

disable.name: disable
disable.description: For four turns, the target will be unable to use whichever move it last used.

doodle.name: doodle
doodle.description: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

doubleteam.name: doubleteam
doubleteam.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to boost its evasiveness.

dragondance.name: dragondance
dragondance.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

eerieimpulse.name: eerieimpulse
eerieimpulse.description: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

electricterrain.name: electricterrain
electricterrain.description: The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground can no longer fall asleep.

electrify.name: electrify
electrify.description: If the target is electrified before it uses a move, the target's move becomes Electric type for that turn.

encore.name: encore
encore.description: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

endure.name: endure
endure.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. This move's chance of failing rises if used in succession.

entrainment.name: entrainment
entrainment.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

fairylock.name: fairylock
fairylock.description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

faketears.name: faketears
faketears.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target. This harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

featherdance.name: featherdance
featherdance.description: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

filletaway.name: filletaway
filletaway.description: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

flatter.name: flatter
flatter.description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also boosts the target's Sp. Atk stat.

floralhealing.name: floralhealing
floralhealing.description: The user restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP. More HP is restored when the ground is Grassy Terrain.

focusenergy.name: focusenergy
focusenergy.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that its future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits.

followme.name: followme
followme.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all opposing Pokémon take aim only at the user.

forest'scurse.name: forest'scurse
forest'scurse.description: The user puts a forest curse on the target. This adds Grass type to the target's type.

gastroacid.name: gastroacid
gastroacid.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

geomancy.name: geomancy
geomancy.description: The user absorbs energy on the first turn, then sharply boosts its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

glare.name: glare
glare.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

grassyterrain.name: grassyterrain
grassyterrain.description: The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

gravity.name: gravity
gravity.description: Enables Flying types or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves for five turns. Moves that involve flying can't be used.

growl.name: growl
growl.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

growth.name: growth
growth.description: The user's body grows all at once, boosting the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

guardsplit.name: guardsplit
guardsplit.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

guardswap.name: guardswap
guardswap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

happyhour.name: happyhour
happyhour.description: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

harden.name: harden
harden.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to boost its Defense stat.

haze.name: haze
haze.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

healbell.name: healbell
healbell.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to cure the status conditions of all its fellow party Pokémon and allies.

healpulse.name: healpulse
healpulse.description: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP.

healingwish.name: healingwish
healingwish.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

heartswap.name: heartswap
heartswap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

helpinghand.name: helpinghand
helpinghand.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

holdhands.name: holdhands
holdhands.description: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy.

honeclaws.name: honeclaws
honeclaws.description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

howl.name: howl
howl.description: The user howls loudly to rouse itself and its allies. This boosts their Attack stats.

hypnosis.name: hypnosis
hypnosis.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall asleep.

imprison.name: imprison
imprison.description: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

ingrain.name: ingrain
ingrain.description: The user lays roots that restore its own HP every turn. Because the user is now rooted, it can't switch out.

instruct.name: instruct
instruct.description: The user instructs the target to reuse the move last used by the target.

irondefense.name: irondefense
irondefense.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

junglehealing.name: junglehealing
junglehealing.description: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

kinesis.name: kinesis
kinesis.description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target's accuracy.

king'sshield.name: king'sshield
king'sshield.description: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. This also lowers the Attack stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

leechseed.name: leechseed
leechseed.description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

leer.name: leer
leer.description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

lifedew.name: lifedew
lifedew.description: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

lightscreen.name: lightscreen
lightscreen.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special moves for five turns.

lock-on.name: lock-on
lock-on.description: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the user's next move does not miss that target.

lovelykiss.name: lovelykiss
lovelykiss.description: With a scary face, the user tries to kiss the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

lunarblessing.name: lunarblessing
lunarblessing.description: The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

lunardance.name: lunardance
lunardance.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP and PP restored and its status conditions cured.

magicpowder.name: magicpowder
magicpowder.description: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target's type to Psychic.

magicroom.name: magicroom
magicroom.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

magnetrise.name: magnetrise
magnetrise.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

magneticflux.name: magneticflux
magneticflux.description: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which boosts the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus Ability or the Minus Ability.

maxguard.name: maxguard
maxguard.description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

meanlook.name: meanlook
meanlook.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

memento.name: memento
memento.description: The user faints. In return, the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats are harshly lowered.

metalsound.name: metalsound
metalsound.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

metronome.name: metronome
metronome.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

milkdrink.name: milkdrink
milkdrink.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

mimic.name: mimic
mimic.description: The user copies the move last used by the target. The copied move can be used until the user of Mimic leaves the battle.

minimize.name: minimize
minimize.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply boosts its evasiveness.

mist.name: mist
mist.description: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

mistyterrain.name: mistyterrain
mistyterrain.description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

moonlight.name: moonlight
moonlight.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

morningsun.name: morningsun
morningsun.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

nastyplot.name: nastyplot
nastyplot.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

noretreat.name: noretreat
noretreat.description: This move boosts all the user's stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

nobleroar.name: nobleroar
nobleroar.description: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

obstruct.name: obstruct
obstruct.description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker's Defense stat.

octolock.name: octolock
octolock.description: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target's Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

painsplit.name: painsplit
painsplit.description: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally splits the combined HP between the target and itself.

partingshot.name: partingshot
partingshot.description: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

perishsong.name: perishsong
perishsong.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

playnice.name: playnice
playnice.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

poisongas.name: poisongas
poisongas.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the faces of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

poisonpowder.name: poisonpowder
poisonpowder.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

powershift.name: powershift
powershift.description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats.

powersplit.name: powersplit
powersplit.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

powerswap.name: powerswap
powerswap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

powertrick.name: powertrick
powertrick.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

protect.name: protect
protect.description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

psychup.name: psychup
psychup.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

psychicterrain.name: psychicterrain
psychicterrain.description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

purify.name: purify
purify.description: The user cures the target's status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user's own HP.

quash.name: quash
quash.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

quickguard.name: quickguard
quickguard.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

quiverdance.name: quiverdance
quiverdance.description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

ragepowder.name: ragepowder
ragepowder.description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.

raindance.name: raindance
raindance.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type attacks. The rain also lowers the power of Fire-type attacks.

recover.name: recover
recover.description: The user regenerates its cells, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

recycle.name: recycle
recycle.description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

reflect.name: reflect
reflect.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical moves for five turns.

reflecttype.name: reflecttype
reflecttype.description: The user reflects the target's type to become the same type as the target.

rest.name: rest
rest.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and cures any status conditions.

revivalblessing.name: revivalblessing
revivalblessing.description: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon's max HP.

roar.name: roar
roar.description: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

rockpolish.name: rockpolish
rockpolish.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply boosts the user's Speed stat.

roleplay.name: roleplay
roleplay.description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's Ability.

roost.name: roost
roost.description: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user's HP by up to half its max HP.

safeguard.name: safeguard
safeguard.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

sandattack.name: sandattack
sandattack.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, lowering the target's accuracy.

sandstorm.name: sandstorm
sandstorm.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to damage all Pokémon except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. The sandstorm also boosts the Sp. Def stats of Rock types.

scaryface.name: scaryface
scaryface.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

screech.name: screech
screech.description: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

shedtail.name: shedtail
shedtail.description: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

shellsmash.name: shellsmash
shellsmash.description: The user breaks its shell, which lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

shelter.name: shelter
shelter.description: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

shiftgear.name: shiftgear
shiftgear.description: The user rotates its gears, boosting its Attack stat and sharply boosting its Speed stat.

shoreup.name: shoreup
shoreup.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP. It regains more HP in a sandstorm.

silktrap.name: silktrap
silktrap.description: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

simplebeam.name: simplebeam
simplebeam.description: The user emits a mysterious psychic wave that changes the target's Ability to Simple.

sing.name: sing
sing.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a beautiful voice that puts the target to sleep.

sketch.name: sketch
sketch.description: This move enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

skillswap.name: skillswap
skillswap.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

slackoff.name: slackoff
slackoff.description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

sleeppowder.name: sleeppowder
sleeppowder.description: The user scatters a cloud of soporific dust that puts the target to sleep.

sleeptalk.name: sleeptalk
sleeptalk.description: The user randomly uses one of the moves it knows. This move can only be used while the user is asleep.

smokescreen.name: smokescreen
smokescreen.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

snowscape.name: snowscape
snowscape.description: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

soak.name: soak
soak.description: The user shoots a torrent of water that changes the target's type to Water.

soft-boiled.name: soft-boiled
soft-boiled.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

speedswap.name: speedswap
speedswap.description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

spicyextract.name: spicyextract
spicyextract.description: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target's Attack stat and harshly lowering the target's Defense stat.

spikes.name: spikes
spikes.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will damage opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

spikyshield.name: spikyshield
spikyshield.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.

spite.name: spite
spite.description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

splash.name: splash
splash.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

spore.name: spore
spore.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

stealthrock.name: stealthrock
stealthrock.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap damages opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

stickyweb.name: stickyweb
stickyweb.description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.

stockpile.name: stockpile
stockpile.description: The user stores power and boosts its Defense and Sp. Def stats. This move can be used up to three times.

strengthsap.name: strengthsap
strengthsap.description: The user restores its own HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It then lowers the target's Attack stat.

stringshot.name: stringshot
stringshot.description: The user blows silk from its mouth that binds opposing Pokémon and harshly lowers their Speed stats.

stuffcheeks.name: stuffcheeks
stuffcheeks.description: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply boosts its Defense stat.

stunspore.name: stunspore
stunspore.description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

substitute.name: substitute
substitute.description: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its own HP. The substitute serves as the user's decoy.

sunnyday.name: sunnyday
sunnyday.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type attacks. The sunlight also lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

supersonic.name: supersonic
supersonic.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

swagger.name: swagger
swagger.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply boosts the target's Attack stat.

swallow.name: swallow
swallow.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to restore its own HP. The more power is stored, the more HP is restored.

sweetkiss.name: sweetkiss
sweetkiss.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

sweetscent.name: sweetscent
sweetscent.description: The user releases a scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.

switcheroo.name: switcheroo
switcheroo.description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

swordsdance.name: swordsdance
swordsdance.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply boosts the user's Attack stat.

synthesis.name: synthesis
synthesis.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

tailglow.name: tailglow
tailglow.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically boosting its Sp. Atk stat.

tailwhip.name: tailwhip
tailwhip.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Defense stats.

tailwind.name: tailwind
tailwind.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the Speed stats of itself and its allies for four turns.

takeheart.name: takeheart
takeheart.description: The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions and boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

tarshot.name: tarshot
tarshot.description: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

taunt.name: taunt
taunt.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

tearfullook.name: tearfullook
tearfullook.description: The user gets teary-eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

teatime.name: teatime
teatime.description: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon currently in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

teeterdance.name: teeterdance
teeterdance.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses every Pokémon around it.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

thunderwave.name: thunderwave
thunderwave.description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

tickle.name: tickle
tickle.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, lowering its Attack and Defense stats.

tidyup.name: tidyup
tidyup.description: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user's Attack and Speed stats.

topsy-turvy.name: topsy-turvy
topsy-turvy.description: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

torment.name: torment
torment.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

toxic.name: toxic
toxic.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

toxicspikes.name: toxicspikes
toxicspikes.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

toxicthread.name: toxicthread
toxicthread.description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

transform.name: transform
transform.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target, right down to having the same move set.

trick.name: trick
trick.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps the target's held item with its own.

trickroom.name: trickroom
trickroom.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

trick-or-treat.name: trick-or-treat
trick-or-treat.description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.

victorydance.name: victorydance
victorydance.description: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

whirlwind.name: whirlwind
whirlwind.description: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

wideguard.name: wideguard
wideguard.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

will-o-wisp.name: will-o-wisp
will-o-wisp.description: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

wish.name: wish
wish.description: One turn after this move is used, the user's or its replacement's HP is restored by up to half the user's max HP.

withdraw.name: withdraw
withdraw.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, boosting its Defense stat.

wonderroom.name: wonderroom
wonderroom.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

workup.name: workup
workup.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted.

worryseed.name: worryseed
worryseed.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

yawn.name: yawn
yawn.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

accelerock.name: accelerock
accelerock.description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

acrobatics.name: acrobatics
acrobatics.description: The user nimbly strikes the target. This attack does massive damage if the user isn't holding an item.

aerialace.name: aerialace
aerialace.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

anchorshot.name: anchorshot
anchorshot.description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

aquacutter.name: aquacutter
aquacutter.description: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

aquajet.name: aquajet
aquajet.description: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

aquastep.name: aquastep
aquastep.description: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

aquatail.name: aquatail
aquatail.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

armthrust.name: armthrust
armthrust.description: The user attacks the target with open-palmed arm thrusts. This move hits two to five times in a row.

assurance.name: assurance
assurance.description: This move's power is doubled if the target has already taken some damage in the same turn.

astonish.name: astonish
astonish.description: The user attacks the target by crying out in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

attackorder.name: attackorder
attackorder.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

aurawheel.name: aurawheel
aurawheel.description: Morpeko attacks and boosts its Speed stat with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.

avalanche.name: avalanche
avalanche.description: This move's power is doubled if the target has inflicted damage on the user in the same turn.

axekick.name: axekick
axekick.description: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

barbbarrage.name: barbbarrage
barbbarrage.description: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move's power is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

beakblast.name: beakblast
beakblast.description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the user while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

beatup.name: beatup
beatup.description: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

behemothbash.name: behemothbash
behemothbash.description: The user's body becomes a firm shield and slams into the target fiercely.

behemothblade.name: behemothblade
behemothblade.description: The user wields a large, powerful sword using its whole body and cuts the target in a vigorous attack.

bind.name: bind
bind.description: A long body, tentacles, or the like are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

bite.name: bite
bite.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

bitterblade.name: bitterblade
bitterblade.description: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

blazekick.name: blazekick
blazekick.description: The user launches a kick that has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit. This may also leave the target with a burn.

blazingtorque.name: blazingtorque
blazingtorque.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may Burn the opponent

bodypress.name: bodypress
bodypress.description: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense stat, the greater the damage this move deals.

bodyslam.name: bodyslam
bodyslam.description: The user attacks by dropping onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

boltbeak.name: boltbeak
boltbeak.description: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. This move's power is doubled if the user moves before the target.

boltstrike.name: boltstrike
boltstrike.description: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

bonerush.name: bonerush
bonerush.description: The user attacks by striking the target with a hard bone. This move hits two to five times in a row.

bonemerang.name: bonemerang
bonemerang.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to damage the target twiceâ€”coming and going.

bounce.name: bounce
bounce.description: The user bounces up high on the first turn, then drops onto the target on the next turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

branchpoke.name: branchpoke
branchpoke.description: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

bravebird.name: bravebird
bravebird.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

breakingswipe.name: breakingswipe
breakingswipe.description: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

brickbreak.name: brickbreak
brickbreak.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

brutalswing.name: brutalswing
brutalswing.description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

bugbite.name: bugbite
bugbite.description: The user attacks by biting the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

bulldoze.name: bulldoze
bulldoze.description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

bulletpunch.name: bulletpunch
bulletpunch.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

bulletseed.name: bulletseed
bulletseed.description: The user attacks by forcefully shooting seeds at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

ceaselessedge.name: ceaselessedge
ceaselessedge.description: The user slashes its shell blade at the target. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.

circlethrow.name: circlethrow
circlethrow.description: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

closecombat.name: closecombat
closecombat.description: The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

collisioncourse.name: collisioncourse
collisioncourse.description: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

combattorque.name: combattorque
combattorque.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may paralyze the opponent

comeuppance.name: comeuppance
comeuppance.description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

counter.name: counter
counter.description: A retaliatory attack that counters any physical move, inflicting double the damage taken.

covet.name: covet
covet.description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

crabhammer.name: crabhammer
crabhammer.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

crosschop.name: crosschop
crosschop.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

crosspoison.name: crosspoison
crosspoison.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

crunch.name: crunch
crunch.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

crushclaw.name: crushclaw
crushclaw.description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

crushgrip.name: crushgrip
crushgrip.description: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

cut.name: cut
cut.description: The target is cut with a scythe, a claw, or the like to inflict damage.

darkestlariat.name: darkestlariat
darkestlariat.description: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

diamondstorm.name: diamondstorm
diamondstorm.description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply boost the user's Defense stat.

dig.name: dig
dig.description: The user burrows into the ground on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

direclaw.name: direclaw
direclaw.description: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

dive.name: dive
dive.description: The user dives on the first turn, then floats up and attacks on the next turn.

doublehit.name: doublehit
doublehit.description: The user slams the target with a tail or the like. The target is hit twice in a row.

doubleironbash.name: doubleironbash
doubleironbash.description: The user uses the hex nut in its chest as an axis to spin, striking the target with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

doublekick.name: doublekick
doublekick.description: The user attacks by kicking the target twice in a row using two feet.

doubleshock.name: doubleshock
doubleshock.description: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

double-edge.name: double-edge
double-edge.description: A reckless life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

dragonascent.name: dragonascent
dragonascent.description: The user attacks the target by dropping out of the sky at high speed. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

dragonclaw.name: dragonclaw
dragonclaw.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws to inflict damage.

dragondarts.name: dragondarts
dragondarts.description: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two opposing Pokémon, this move hits each of them once.

dragonrush.name: dragonrush
dragonrush.description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

dragontail.name: dragontail
dragontail.description: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

drainpunch.name: drainpunch
drainpunch.description: The user attacks with an energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

drillpeck.name: drillpeck
drillpeck.description: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

drillrun.name: drillrun
drillrun.description: The user crashes into the target while rotating its body like a drill. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

drumbeating.name: drumbeating
drumbeating.description: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

dualwingbeat.name: dualwingbeat
dualwingbeat.description: The user slams the target with its wings to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

dynamicpunch.name: dynamicpunch
dynamicpunch.description: The user attacks by punching the target with full concentrated power. This also confuses the target.

earthquake.name: earthquake
earthquake.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

endeavor.name: endeavor
endeavor.description: The user inflicts damage by cutting down the target's HP to roughly equal the user's HP.

explosion.name: explosion
explosion.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

extremespeed.name: extremespeed
extremespeed.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

facade.name: facade
facade.description: This move's power is doubled if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

fakeout.name: fakeout
fakeout.description: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

falsesurrender.name: falsesurrender
falsesurrender.description: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

falseswipe.name: falseswipe
falseswipe.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

feint.name: feint
feint.description: This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

fellstinger.name: fellstinger
fellstinger.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat is boosted drastically.

firefang.name: firefang
firefang.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

firelash.name: firelash
firelash.description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

firepunch.name: firepunch
firepunch.description: The target is attacked with a fiery punch. This may also leave the target with a burn.

firstimpression.name: firstimpression
firstimpression.description: Although this move has great power, it works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

fishiousrend.name: fishiousrend
fishiousrend.description: The user rends the target with its hard gills. This move's power is doubled if the user moves before the target.

fissure.name: fissure
fissure.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

flail.name: flail
flail.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

flamecharge.name: flamecharge
flamecharge.description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up momentum, the user boosts its Speed stat.

flamewheel.name: flamewheel
flamewheel.description: The user attacks by cloaking itself in fire and charging at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

flareblitz.name: flareblitz
flareblitz.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with a burn.

fling.name: fling
fling.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

flipturn.name: flipturn
flipturn.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

flowertrick.name: flowertrick
flowertrick.description: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

fly.name: fly
fly.description: The user flies up into the sky on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

flyingpress.name: flyingpress
flyingpress.description: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

focuspunch.name: focuspunch
focuspunch.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before using the move.

forcepalm.name: forcepalm
forcepalm.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

foulplay.name: foulplay
foulplay.description: The user turns the target's strength against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage this move inflicts.

freezeshock.name: freezeshock
freezeshock.description: The turn after using this move, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

furyattack.name: furyattack
furyattack.description: The user attacks by jabbing the target with a horn, a beak, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

furycutter.name: furycutter
furycutter.description: The user attacks by slashing the target with scythes, claws, or the like. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

furyswipes.name: furyswipes
furyswipes.description: The user attacks by raking the target with claws, scythes, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

fusionbolt.name: fusionbolt
fusionbolt.description: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move's power is boosted when influenced by an enormous flame.

geargrind.name: geargrind
geargrind.description: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at the target twice in a row.

gigaimpact.name: gigaimpact
gigaimpact.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

gigatonhammer.name: gigatonhammer
gigatonhammer.description: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

glaciallance.name: glaciallance
glaciallance.description: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

glaiverush.name: glaiverush
glaiverush.description: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss and will inflict double damage until the user's next turn.

grassyglide.name: grassyglide
grassyglide.description: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

gravapple.name: gravapple
gravapple.description: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

guillotine.name: guillotine
guillotine.description: A vicious tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

gunkshot.name: gunkshot
gunkshot.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

gyroball.name: gyroball
gyroball.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

hammerarm.name: hammerarm
hammerarm.description: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Speed stat.

headcharge.name: headcharge
headcharge.description: The user charges its head into the target, using its powerful guard hair. This also damages the user a little.

headsmash.name: headsmash
headsmash.description: The user attacks the target with a hazardous full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

headbutt.name: headbutt
headbutt.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

headlongrush.name: headlongrush
headlongrush.description: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

heatcrash.name: heatcrash
heatcrash.description: The user slams into the target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

heavyslam.name: heavyslam
heavyslam.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

highhorsepower.name: highhorsepower
highhorsepower.description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

highjumpkick.name: highjumpkick
highjumpkick.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

holdback.name: holdback
holdback.description: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

hornattack.name: hornattack
hornattack.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

horndrill.name: horndrill
horndrill.description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

hornleech.name: hornleech
hornleech.description: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

hyperdrill.name: hyperdrill
hyperdrill.description: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

hyperspacefury.name: hyperspacefury
hyperspacefury.description: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. This also lowers the user's Defense stat.

icefang.name: icefang
icefang.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

icehammer.name: icehammer
icehammer.description: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Speed stat.

icepunch.name: icepunch
icepunch.description: The target is attacked with an icy punch. This may also leave the target frozen.

iceshard.name: iceshard
iceshard.description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

icespinner.name: icespinner
icespinner.description: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

iciclecrash.name: iciclecrash
iciclecrash.description: The user attacks by crashing large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

iciclespear.name: iciclespear
iciclespear.description: The user attacks by launching sharp icicles at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

ironhead.name: ironhead
ironhead.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

irontail.name: irontail
irontail.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

ivycudgel.name: ivycudgel
ivycudgel.description: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

jawlock.name: jawlock
jawlock.description: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

jetpunch.name: jetpunch
jetpunch.description: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

knockoff.name: knockoff
knockoff.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, making it unusable for that battle. This move does more damage if the target has a held item.

kowtowcleave.name: kowtowcleave
kowtowcleave.description: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

land'swrath.name: land'swrath
land'swrath.description: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to inflict damage.

lashout.name: lashout
lashout.description: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's stats were lowered during this turn.

lastresort.name: lastresort
lastresort.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

lastrespects.name: lastrespects
lastrespects.description: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

leafblade.name: leafblade
leafblade.description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and cuts the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

leafage.name: leafage
leafage.description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

leechlife.name: leechlife
leechlife.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

lick.name: lick
lick.description: The user licks the target with a long tongue to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

liquidation.name: liquidation
liquidation.description: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

lowkick.name: lowkick
lowkick.description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

lowsweep.name: lowsweep
lowsweep.description: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

lunge.name: lunge
lunge.description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

machpunch.name: machpunch
machpunch.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

magicaltorque.name: magicaltorque
magicaltorque.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may confuse the opponent

megakick.name: megakick
megakick.description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle- packed power.

megapunch.name: megapunch
megapunch.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle- packed power.

megahorn.name: megahorn
megahorn.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

metalburst.name: metalburst
metalburst.description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

metalclaw.name: metalclaw
metalclaw.description: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also boost the user's Attack stat.

meteorassault.name: meteorassault
meteorassault.description: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can't move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

meteormash.name: meteormash
meteormash.description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also boost the user's Attack stat.

mortalspin.name: mortalspin
mortalspin.description: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

mountaingale.name: mountaingale
mountaingale.description: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage. This may also make the target flinch.

multi-attack.name: multi-attack
multi-attack.description: Cloaking itself in powerful energy, the user slams into the target to inflict damage. This move's type changes depending on the kind of memory disc held by the user.

nightslash.name: nightslash
nightslash.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

noxioustorque.name: noxioustorque
noxioustorque.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may Poison the opponent

nuzzle.name: nuzzle
nuzzle.description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

orderup.name: orderup
orderup.description: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

outrage.name: outrage
outrage.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

payday.name: payday
payday.description: Coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

payback.name: payback
payback.description: The user stores power, then attacks. This move's power is doubled if the user moves after the target.

peck.name: peck
peck.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn to inflict damage.

petalblizzard.name: petalblizzard
petalblizzard.description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and damages everything around it.

phantomforce.name: phantomforce
phantomforce.description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

pinmissile.name: pinmissile
pinmissile.description: The user attacks by shooting sharp spikes at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

plasmafists.name: plasmafists
plasmafists.description: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

playrough.name: playrough
playrough.description: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

pluck.name: pluck
pluck.description: The user attacks by pecking the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

poisonfang.name: poisonfang
poisonfang.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

poisonjab.name: poisonjab
poisonjab.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

poisonsting.name: poisonsting
poisonsting.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

poisontail.name: poisontail
poisontail.description: The user hits the target with its tail. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also poison the target.

poltergeist.name: poltergeist
poltergeist.description: The user attacks by controlling the target's item. This move fails if the target isn't holding an item.

populationbomb.name: populationbomb
populationbomb.description: The user's fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

pounce.name: pounce
pounce.description: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

pound.name: pound
pound.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

powertrip.name: powertrip
powertrip.description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

powerwhip.name: powerwhip
powerwhip.description: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to lash the target.

precipiceblades.name: precipiceblades
precipiceblades.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

present.name: present
present.description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. The gift restores HP sometimes, however.

psyblade.name: psyblade
psyblade.description: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.

psychicfangs.name: psychicfangs
psychicfangs.description: The user attacks by biting the target with its psychic capabilities. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

psychocut.name: psychocut
psychocut.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

psyshieldbash.name: psyshieldbash
psyshieldbash.description: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This also boosts the user's Defense stat.

pyroball.name: pyroball
pyroball.description: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

quickattack.name: quickattack
quickattack.description: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

ragefist.name: ragefist
ragefist.description: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

ragingbull.name: ragingbull
ragingbull.description: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

ragingfury.name: ragingfury
ragingfury.description: The user rampages around spewing flames for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

rapidspin.name: rapidspin
rapidspin.description: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

razorleaf.name: razorleaf
razorleaf.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

razorshell.name: razorshell
razorshell.description: The user cuts the target with sharp shells to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

retaliate.name: retaliate
retaliate.description: The user takes revenge for a fainted ally. This move's power is boosted if an ally fainted in the previous turn.

reversal.name: reversal
reversal.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

rockblast.name: rockblast
rockblast.description: The user attacks by hurling hard rocks at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

rockslide.name: rockslide
rockslide.description: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

rocksmash.name: rocksmash
rocksmash.description: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

rockthrow.name: rockthrow
rockthrow.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to inflict damage.

rocktomb.name: rocktomb
rocktomb.description: The user hurls boulders at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by cutting off its movement.

rockwrecker.name: rockwrecker
rockwrecker.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

rollout.name: rollout
rollout.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. This attack becomes more powerful each time it hits.

sacredfire.name: sacredfire
sacredfire.description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

sacredsword.name: sacredsword
sacredsword.description: The user attacks by slicing with a sword. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

saltcure.name: saltcure
saltcure.description: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

sandtomb.name: sandtomb
sandtomb.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

scaleshot.name: scaleshot
scaleshot.description: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

scratch.name: scratch
scratch.description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

seedbomb.name: seedbomb
seedbomb.description: The user attacks by slamming a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

seismictoss.name: seismictoss
seismictoss.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

self-destruct.name: self-destruct
self-destruct.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

shadowbone.name: shadowbone
shadowbone.description: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

shadowclaw.name: shadowclaw
shadowclaw.description: The user attacks by slashing the target with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

shadowforce.name: shadowforce
shadowforce.description: The user disappears on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

shadowpunch.name: shadowpunch
shadowpunch.description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

shadowsneak.name: shadowsneak
shadowsneak.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

skittersmack.name: skittersmack
skittersmack.description: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

skyattack.name: skyattack
skyattack.description: The user attacks the turn after using this move. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also make the target flinch.

slam.name: slam
slam.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

slash.name: slash
slash.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws, scythes, or the like. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

smackdown.name: smackdown
smackdown.description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. If the target is in the air, it will be knocked down to the ground.

smartstrike.name: smartstrike
smartstrike.description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

snaptrap.name: snaptrap
snaptrap.description: The user snares the target in a snap trap that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

solarblade.name: solarblade
solarblade.description: The user gathers light on the first turn, then fills a blade with the light's energy and attacks on the next turn.

spark.name: spark
spark.description: The user attacks the target with an electrically charged tackle. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

spectralthief.name: spectralthief
spectralthief.description: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

spinout.name: spinout
spinout.description: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

spiritbreak.name: spiritbreak
spiritbreak.description: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

spiritshackle.name: spiritshackle
spiritshackle.description: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from fleeing.

steelroller.name: steelroller
steelroller.description: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails if the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

steelwing.name: steelwing
steelwing.description: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also boost the user's Defense stat.

stomp.name: stomp
stomp.description: The user attacks by stomping on the target with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

stompingtantrum.name: stompingtantrum
stompingtantrum.description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

stoneaxe.name: stoneaxe
stoneaxe.description: The user swings its stone axes at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.

stoneedge.name: stoneedge
stoneedge.description: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

stormthrow.name: stormthrow
stormthrow.description: The user attacks by striking the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

strength.name: strength
strength.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

struggle.name: struggle
struggle.description: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no remaining PP. It also damages the user a little.

suckerpunch.name: suckerpunch
suckerpunch.description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

sunsteelstrike.name: sunsteelstrike
sunsteelstrike.description: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

superfang.name: superfang
superfang.description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

superpower.name: superpower
superpower.description: The user attacks the target with great power. This also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

surgingstrikes.name: surgingstrikes
surgingstrikes.description: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This move always lands a critical hit.

tackle.name: tackle
tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

tailslap.name: tailslap
tailslap.description: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. This move hits two to five times in a row.

takedown.name: takedown
takedown.description: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

thief.name: thief
thief.description: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

thousandarrows.name: thousandarrows
thousandarrows.description: This move can hit opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon will be knocked down to the ground.

thousandwaves.name: thousandwaves
thousandwaves.description: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those it hits can't flee from battle.

thrash.name: thrash
thrash.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

throatchop.name: throatchop
throatchop.description: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

thunderfang.name: thunderfang
thunderfang.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

thunderpunch.name: thunderpunch
thunderpunch.description: The target is attacked with an electrified punch. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunderouskick.name: thunderouskick
thunderouskick.description: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

trailblaze.name: trailblaze
trailblaze.description: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

triplearrows.name: triplearrows
triplearrows.description: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target's Defense stat or make it flinch.

tripleaxel.name: tripleaxel
tripleaxel.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

tripledive.name: tripledive
tripledive.description: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

triplekick.name: triplekick
triplekick.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

tropkick.name: tropkick
tropkick.description: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

u-turn.name: u-turn
u-turn.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

v-create.name: v-create
v-create.description: The user emits a hot flame from its forehead and hurls itself at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

vinewhip.name: vinewhip
vinewhip.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

visegrip.name: visegrip
visegrip.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

volttackle.name: volttackle
volttackle.description: The user electrifies itself and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with paralysis.

waterfall.name: waterfall
waterfall.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

wavecrash.name: wavecrash
wavecrash.description: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

wickedblow.name: wickedblow
wickedblow.description: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

wickedtorque.name: wickedtorque
wickedtorque.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may cause the opponent to fall asleep

wildcharge.name: wildcharge
wildcharge.description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into the target. This also damages the user a little.

wingattack.name: wingattack
wingattack.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

woodhammer.name: woodhammer
woodhammer.description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

wrap.name: wrap
wrap.description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

x-scissor.name: x-scissor
x-scissor.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes, claws, or the like as if they were a pair of scissors.

zenheadbutt.name: zenheadbutt
zenheadbutt.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

zingzap.name: zingzap
zingzap.description: The user crashes into the target, delivering a powerful electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.
